Excellent memorables for all mourners especially mourners for the loss of dearest relations : gathered out of Mr. B's prepared (though not preached) farewel sermon, at Kederminster, Aug. 24, 1662, upon our Savior's words. Baxter, Richard, 1615-1691.
1 sheet ([1] p.)
Printed for Tho. Parkhurst ..., London : 1691.
Written by Richard Baxter. Cf. Halkett & Laing (2nd ed.). Reproduction of original in British Library.
